Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    bt.torrent.RarestFirstSelectionStrategy
    Since 1.1 replaced by RarestFirstSelector
    bt.torrent.SequentialSelectionStrategy
    Since 1.1 replaced by SequentialSelector
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    bt.peer.IPeerRegistry.addPeerConsumer(Torrent, Consumer<Peer>)
    since 1.3 in favor of IPeerRegistry.addPeerConsumer(TorrentId, Consumer)
    bt.Bt.attachToRuntime(BtRuntime)
    since 1.1 in favor of Bt.client() and Bt.client(BtRuntime) builder methods
    bt.Bt.client(Storage)
    since 1.1 in favor of Bt.client() and Bt.client(BtRuntime) builder methods
    bt.torrent.TorrentRegistry.getDescriptor(Torrent)
    since 1.3 in favor of TorrentRegistry.getDescriptor(TorrentId)
    bt.torrent.TorrentRegistry.getOrCreateDescriptor(Torrent, Storage)
    since 1.3 in favor of more clearly named TorrentRegistry.register(Torrent, Storage)
    bt.dht.DHTService.getPeers(Torrent)
    since 1.3 in favor of DHTService.getPeers(TorrentId)
    bt.peer.PeerSourceFactory.getPeerSource(Torrent)
    since 1.3 in favor of PeerSourceFactory.getPeerSource(TorrentId)
    bt.Bt.initEagerly()
    since 1.1 in favor of Bt.client() and Bt.client(BtRuntime) builder methods
    bt.peer.IPeerRegistry.removePeerConsumers(Torrent)
    since 1.3 in favor of IPeerRegistry.removePeerConsumers(TorrentId)
    bt.tracker.Tracker.request(Torrent)
    since 1.3 in favor of Tracker.request(TorrentId)
    bt.Bt.selector(PieceSelectionStrategy)
    since 1.1 in favor of Bt.client() and Bt.client(BtRuntime) builder methods
    bt.Bt.standalone()
    since 1.1 in favor of Bt.client() and Bt.client(BtRuntime) builder methods
    bt.Bt.torrentSupplier(Supplier<Torrent>)
    since 1.1 in favor of Bt.client() and Bt.client(BtRuntime) builder methods
    bt.Bt.url(URL)
    since 1.1 in favor of Bt.client() and Bt.client(BtRuntime) builder methods
